bibl.title: Samothrace. 10. The Propylon of Ptolemy II. Text; - Plates. (Bollingen Series. 60.)
bibl.note: The elaborate marble Propylon, dedicated by Ptolemy II just before or just after 275 B.C., was the entrance to the Sanctuary of the Great Gods.
FRAZER Alfred, Samothrace. 10. The Propylon of Ptolemy II. Text; - Plates. (Bollingen Series. 60.)
Princeton, Princeton University Press, 1990, 4Â°, xxi-244 pp., 184 figg.; - v-88 pll. ISBN 0-691-09922-7. $130.
